title: President speaks to Qatar Emir on cooperation
body_lines: Doha; The Emir of Qatar H H Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani held a telephone conversation with President of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka Gotabaya Rajapaksa on Tuesday (22).

During the phone call, they discussed relations of cooperation between the two countries and prospects for supporting and developing them, in addition to a number of regional and international issues of common interest.
New directive from CBSL to banks on foreign exchange inflows
